msIdentifier.collection: Assistant Adjutant General Letter Book - No. 1 ; 5 Sept 1863 - 2 Feb 1864

body.p: According to the provisions of the Militia law, approved Aug 31st 1862 -- each County Court Clerk is to Keep recorded in his Office a complete list of the names of the Enrolled Militia of his County, and shall furnish the Adjutant General with a copy of such record, prior to the 1st day of September of each year.
While many have been thus furnished -- I do not find that you have Complied with this provision of the law.
You will be expected to send such list to this office immediately

By order of the Governor
John Boyle
Adjt Gen Ky Vols
